topic: Describe a website you visit often
bullets: What you usually do on this website
Explain why this website is useful or interesting to you

topic: Describe a successful business person you admire
bullets: What kind of business they do
Explain why you think they are successful

topic: Describe a time when you were very busy
bullets: Explain how you felt after you finished everything

topic: Describe a crowded place you have visited
bullets: Explain how you felt about being in such a crowded place

topic: Describe a wild animal you are interested in
bullets: Explain why you find this animal interesting

topic: Describe something you shared with others (or another person)
bullets: Explain how you felt about sharing it

topic: Describe a family member you enjoy spending time with
bullets: What kind of person they are
Explain why you enjoy spending time with them

topic: Describe a piece of clothing you enjoy wearing
bullets: When and where you bought it
Explain why you enjoy wearing it
